title: Bug 10022 - Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when a manual build is required.
SR: To reproduce the issue, go to the Java perspective and open the context-sensitive popup menu. Verify that the 'Build' action is always enabled, even when the build is already done automatically. Expected behavior is that the 'Build' action is only enabled when a manual build is required.
